name: skill-cli-front-inbox-manager
description: Claude Code plugin for the Skill Recordings Front Inbox Manager CLI. Provides inbox management, conversation triage, archival, tagging, reporting, and daily briefing workflows.
author: Skill Recordings

skills.name: Front Inbox Manager
skills.description: Manage Front inboxes, conversations, tags, archival, triage, and reporting via the skill CLI.

commands.name: front inbox
commands.description: List all inboxes, or list conversations in a specific inbox with filtering

commands.name: front message
commands.description: Fetch full message details (body, author, recipients, attachments)

commands.name: front conversation
commands.description: Fetch conversation details (status, tags, assignee) with optional message history

commands.name: front triage
commands.description: Categorize inbox conversations as actionable, noise, or spam with optional auto-archive

commands.name: front report
commands.description: Generate forensics report for an inbox (volume, tags, senders, unresolved)

commands.name: front archive
commands.description: Archive one or more conversations by ID

commands.name: front bulk-archive
commands.description: Bulk archive conversations matching filters (sender, tag, age, status)

commands.name: front tags list
commands.description: List all tags with conversation counts, optionally filtered to unused

commands.name: front tags delete
commands.description: Delete a tag by ID with optional force flag

commands.name: front tags cleanup
commands.description: Clean up tags: delete duplicates, merge case variants, remove obsolete, create missing standard tags

commands.name: front teammates
commands.description: List all teammates in the workspace

commands.name: front pull
commands.description: Export conversations to JSON for eval datasets with filtering
